397490.name: Over The Hills And Far Away - Official Soundtrack
397490.description:
The official soundtrack to the visual novel Over The Hills And Far Away, produced by Seycara Music and Arts.

Music composed and conducted by Yuang Chen
Produced and mastered by Takumi Nishimura
Performances featuring The Seycara Orchestra

'After All' written and composed by Seycara Music and Arts, with vocals by Sagisapon.

Featuring:
  • 20 original orchestral tracks
  • An original vocal track featuring the vocal talent of Sagisapon
  • MP3 Format
